amendment.description: Amendment expresses the sense of Congress that the 2001 AUMF has been utilized beyond the scope that Congress intended, and that any new authorization for the use of military force to replace the 2001 AUMF should include a sunset clause, a clear and specific expression of objectives, targets, and geographic scope, and reporting requirements.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 425 printed in Part B of House Report 116-143 to express the sense of Congress that the 2001 AUMF has been utilized beyond the scope that Congress intended; and that any new authorization for the use of military force to replace the 2001 AUMF should include a sunset clause, a clear and specific expression of objectives, targets, and geographic scope, and reporting requirements.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lee (CA) amendment (A050) Agreed to by recorded vote: 237 - 183 (Roll no. 465).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lee (CA) amendment (A050) Agreed to by recorded vote: 237 - 183 (Roll no. 465).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A050) offered by Ms. Lee (CA).
